## Arrow: Fast Loading and Processing of Large Data

Added Thu Feb 20, 2025

**What is this?**

The **arrow** package, created by Ursa Labs, allows for fast loading and
processing of large datasets in R. It supports efficient data
interchange, making it an essential tool for handling large-scale data
workflows

1.  Link to package: <https://arrow.apache.org/docs/r/>
